attributes.action: convice the Queen she has to sack Rowan Williams as the Archbishop of Canterbury because his inept and insensitive speech about Sharia proves he is unfit for office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rowan William's job is to look after his flock - he has failed and should go.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
